Name: Squeal
Description: Deal 1 damage to one or two non-elite enemies.

Name: Run Wild
Description:
Rotate two hero cards on your field.
If the number of encounter cards on the field is equal to or greater than the number of hero cards on your field, deal 1 damage to each enemy.

Name: Panic
Description: Deal 1 damage to one or two enemies. If the number of encounter cards on the field is equal to or greater than the number of hero cards on your field, deal 2 damage to those enemies instead.

Name: Mess Around
Description:
Remove 1 ⏳ from one duration.
Rotate one hero card on your field.
Subdue one enemy.

Name: Cover with Mud
Description: Deal 1 damage to one enemy and subdue it twice.

Name: Root Out
Description:
Choose one:
• Deal 2 damage to each enemy.
• Remove 2 ⏳ from each duration.
